ARABIC: وَإِنَّا لَجَٰعِلُونَ مَا عَلَيْهَا صَعِيدًا جُرُزًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We will certainly make everything on it a barren wasteland.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: For We shall certainly turn it to barren dust.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: In the ultimate, We shall reduce all that is on the earth to a barren plain.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Let it be known that We will turn all things on earth into dust.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed We shall one day make all that is on it a barren plain.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And verily, We shall make all that is on it bare, dry soil.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And most surely We will make what is on it bare ground without herbage.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and We shall surely make all that is on it barren dust.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And lo! We shall make all that is thereon a barren mound.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: but We shall reduce all this to barren waste.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And verily We are going to make whatsoever is thereon a soil bare.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And indeed We will turn whatever is on it into a barren plain.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Verily what is on earth we shall make but as dust and dry soil (without growth or herbage).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And verily! We shall make all that is on it (the earth) a bare dry soil (without any vegetation or trees, etc.).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We will surely reduce all that is on it to barren dust.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And We will turn what is on it into barren waste.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And indeed, We will make that which is upon it [into] a barren ground.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [18:8] And indeed We shall turn all that is therein into barren shreds, that produce no plants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And lo! We shall make) change (all that is therein) of ornament into (a barren mound) a smooth dust with no vegetation.
